item.title: FT Most Read: Friday, September 13, 2024 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. [Opinion] Why are caps now attached to bottles? Blame the EU
2. Trump rules out another US presidential debate
3. Berkshire vice-chair Jain sells more than half of his stake in company
4. High pressure, long days, crushing workloads: why is investment banking like this?
5. Michel Houellebecq: ‘People who have humanitarian ideas are a catastrophe’
item.guid: FT Most Read: Friday, September 13, 2024 at 6:20 PM UTC
